title: Water Level Indicator
summary: Measure water level using simple probes and an LED indicator.
steps: Connect LED with resistor to indicate level
expectedOutput: LED lights up when water reaches probe level.
conclusion: Students learn about electrical conductivity and sensors.
engineeringNotes: Use two comparators for multi-level detection in advanced version.

title: Mini Volcano (Baking Soda + Vinegar)
summary: Create an erupting volcano using a safe acid-base reaction.
conclusion: Demonstrates CO2 production in acid-base reaction.
engineeringNotes: Measure reaction rate by varying concentrations for advanced study.

title: Smart Irrigation Starter
summary: Automatic watering using a soil moisture sensor and relay.
steps: Connect moisture sensor to analog pin
expectedOutput: Pump runs automatically when soil is dry.
conclusion: Teaches sensor interfacing and automated control.
engineeringNotes: Implement hysteresis to avoid rapid switching. Add MQTT for remote control.

title: Solar Oven
summary: Build a simple solar oven to cook or heat food using reflective materials.
steps: Angle towards sun and measure temperature
expectedOutput: Temperature rise sufficient to warm food.
conclusion: Solar radiation can be harnessed for heating.
engineeringNotes: Add insulation layers and parabolic reflectors for higher temps.

title: Paper Bridge Strength Test
summary: Design and test bridges made of paper to learn about load distribution.
steps: Place on supports and add weights until failure
conclusion: Shape and structure increase strength beyond material limits.
engineeringNotes: Introduce truss patterns and measure stress distribution for advanced study.

title: Homemade Barometer
summary: Build a simple barometer to measure air pressure changes.
steps: Create scale and observe pointer shifts with pressure changes
expectedOutput: Pointer moves with pressure changes (weather changes).
conclusion: Air pressure variations can be measured with simple tools.
engineeringNotes: Calibrate with local pressure data for accuracy.

title: Balloon-Powered Car
summary: Make a small car propelled by escaping air from a balloon.
steps: Attach balloon with straw as nozzle
expectedOutput: Car moves forward when balloon deflates.
engineeringNotes: Optimize nozzle geometry and reduce friction for speed.

title: Simple Circuit: Series & Parallel
summary: Build series and parallel LED circuits to compare brightness and current.
expectedOutput: Parallel LEDs maintain brightness better when one fails.
conclusion: Series circuits share current; parallel share voltage.
engineeringNotes: Use Ohm's law and Kirchhoff's laws for analysis.

title: Static Electricity Dance
summary: Use static charge from rubbing balloons to make small bits 'dance' and stick.
steps: Bring near paper to see attraction
conclusion: Static electricity can cause forces at a distance.
engineeringNotes: Measure charge with electroscope for advanced version.

title: Wind Speed Anemometer
summary: Construct a cup anemometer to measure relative wind speed.
steps: Convert rotations to speed using calibration
expectedOutput: Rotational rate proportional to wind speed.
engineeringNotes: Use rotary encoder for digital readings in advanced builds.

title: DIY Compass
summary: Make a simple compass using magnetized needle and floating base.
steps: Float on water and observe alignment
conclusion: Magnetic materials align with Earth's field.
engineeringNotes: Calibrate with known compass for accuracy.

title: Water Filtration Model
summary: Build a layered filter using sand, gravel and charcoal to purify dirty water.
steps: Pour dirty water and collect filtrate
expectedOutput: Filtered water appears clearer; turbidity reduced.
engineeringNotes: Test with turbidity meter for quantitative study.

title: Thermal Insulation Test
summary: Compare insulation properties of materials by measuring heat loss.
expectedOutput: Different materials show different rates of heat loss.
engineeringNotes: Calculate heat transfer coefficients for advanced analysis.

title: Egg Drop Challenge
summary: Design a structure to protect an egg from breaking when dropped.
expectedOutput: Optimized designs prevent egg from cracking.
conclusion: Cushioning and structure reduce impact forces.
engineeringNotes: Model deceleration and impulse for advanced work.
futureScope: Use sensors to log acceleration during impact

title: Plant Growth under Colored Light
summary: Investigate plant growth when exposed to different colored lights.
steps: Expose identical plants to different light colors
expectedOutput: Different light colors affect growth rate and morphology.
conclusion: Light spectrum influences photosynthesis and plant development.
engineeringNotes: Measure chlorophyll fluorescence for deeper study.

title: DIY Seismograph (Basic)
summary: Construct a simple seismograph to detect vibrations using pendulum and marker.
steps: Suspend weight to act as reference
expectedOutput: Stationary instrument shows wiggles when vibrations occur.
conclusion: Mechanical seismographs can register ground motion.

title: Electromagnet Model
summary: Create a simple electromagnet and test its strength.
expectedOutput: More coil turns increase electromagnet strength.
conclusion: Electric current generates a magnetic field.
engineeringNotes: Measure magnetic field using Hall sensor for advanced analysis.

title: Hand Sanitizer Dispenser (Automatic)
summary: Create a touchless sanitizer dispenser using an IR sensor.
engineeringNotes: Use ultrasonic sensor for more accuracy.

title: Rainwater Harvesting Model
summary: Build a working model showing how rainwater is stored and filtered.
steps: Build storage tank with filter layers
expectedOutput: Water flows from roof → pipe → filter → tank.

title: Ball Bearing Model
summary: Create a simple working model of a ball bearing.
expectedOutput: Center rotates smoothly due to marbles.

title: Buzzer Security Alarm
summary: Build a simple alarm system for doors/windows using a switch.
conclusion: Switches can act as security sensors.
engineeringNotes: Add magnetic reed switch for real-world accuracy.

title: Handmade Vacuum Cleaner
summary: Create a simple mini vacuum cleaner using a DC motor.
expectedOutput: Airflow creates suction for cleaning small particles.

title: Lung Capacity Tester
summary: Measure lung capacity using a water-displacement method.
steps: Blow air through tube to displace water
conclusion: Different people have different lung volumes.

title: Hydraulic Lift Model
summary: Use syringes and water to create a working hydraulic lift.
steps: Push small syringe to lift platform
expectedOutput: Smaller syringe creates larger force in bigger syringe.

title: Magnetic Levitation Model
summary: Demonstrate magnetic repulsion to levitate an object.
steps: Set magnets with same poles facing

title: Solar Tracker System
summary: A dual LDR-based system that automatically rotates a solar panel toward sunlight.
steps: Test at different times of day
expectedOutput: Panel automatically rotates to face sun.
engineeringNotes: Implement PID control for smooth tracking.

title: RFID Attendance System
summary: Use RFID tags to automate attendance with an LCD and buzzer.
engineeringNotes: Use cloud logging for enterprise version.

title: Smart Street Light System
summary: Street lights that turn ON only when motion is detected.
expectedOutput: Lights turn on only when needed.

title: Air Pollution Detector (MQ-135)
summary: Monitor air quality using MQ-135 sensor for CO2, NH3, NOx.
engineeringNotes: Calibrate sensor with known ppm samples.

title: Mini Weather Station
summary: A system that tracks temperature, humidity, and atmospheric pressure.
engineeringNotes: Send data to cloud for long-term trends.

title: LED Traffic Light System
summary: Build a mini traffic light model using LEDs to understand traffic control.
expectedOutput: LEDs switch in traffic light pattern.
engineeringNotes: Use timers instead of delays for smoother operation.

title: Robotic Hand (String Actuated)
summary: Create a robotic hand using cardboard and strings mimicking human fingers.
expectedOutput: Cardboard fingers bend like a hand.
engineeringNotes: Convert to servo-operated version for advanced use.

title: Density Tower
summary: Layer different liquids to show density differences.
steps: Drop objects to test sinking levels
futureScope: Add more liquids with known densities

title: Wind Turbine Model
summary: Build a mini windmill that generates electricity using a DC motor.
steps: Blow air to rotate and light LED
expectedOutput: LED lights up when blades rotate.

title: Electric Motor (Homemade)
summary: Build a working DC motor using coil, magnets, and a battery.
engineeringNotes: Optimize coil turns for higher torque.

title: Heartbeat Sensor Monitor
summary: Use a pulse sensor to display live heart rate on an LCD.

title: Water Rocket
summary: Launch a bottle rocket using water and air pressure.

title: pH Indicator from Red Cabbage
summary: Create a natural pH indicator using cabbage juice.
expectedOutput: Solutions show unique colors based on pH.
engineeringNotes: Use a color sensor to automate pH reading.

title: Capacitor Charging & Discharging Demo
summary: Visualize capacitor charge/discharge curve using an LED and resistor.

title: Smart Dustbin (Auto Open)
summary: Dustbin that opens automatically using ultrasonic sensor.

title: Electricity from Lemon
summary: Generate electricity using lemon, copper, and zinc plates.

title: Pulley System Model
summary: Build single and compound pulley systems to compare effort.

title: Humidity Sensor System
summary: Use a DHT11 sensor to monitor humidity.

title: DIY Microscope
summary: Make a working microscope using a drop of water as a lens.

title: Bottle Water Fountain
summary: Create a water fountain using air pressure difference.

title: Solar-Powered Car
summary: Build a mini car that runs using solar energy.

title: Soil Testing Kit Model
summary: Analyze soil pH, moisture, and texture.

title: Smart Fire Alarm System
summary: Use an MQ-2 smoke sensor to create a fire alarm.
engineeringNotes: Use GSM module to send alerts.

title: Wireless Power Transfer (Inductive)
summary: Transfer power wirelessly using two coils.

title: Lie Detector (Galvanic Skin Response)
summary: Measure skin resistance changes to build a simple lie detector.

title: DIY Stethoscope
summary: Make a simple stethoscope to hear your heartbeat.

title: Smart Door Lock (RFID)
summary: Create an RFID-based secure door lock.
engineeringNotes: Add EEPROM to store multiple IDs.

title: Mini Hydraulic Lift
summary: Build a hydraulic lift using syringes and tubes.

title: Hovercraft Model
summary: Make a hovercraft using balloon and CD.

title: Magnetic Levitation Model
summary: Build a simple magnetic levitation stand.

title: Mini CNC Plotter
summary: Make a small CNC plotter using stepper motors.

title: Water Cycle Simulator
summary: Create a mini water cycle with evaporation and condensation.

title: DIY Vacuum Cleaner
summary: Build a small vacuum cleaner using a DC motor and fan.
engineeringNotes: Improve airflow with better blade design.

title: Infrared Remote System
summary: Control devices using IR transmitter and receiver.

title: Air Pollution Detector
summary: Detect air quality using MQ-135 sensor.

title: Electromagnetic Crane
summary: Use an electromagnet to lift metal objects.

title: Smart Weather Station
summary: Monitor temperature, humidity, and rainfall.

title: Electricity Usage Monitor
summary: Measure AC power consumption using a non-invasive sensor.

title: Hydroponics Model
summary: Grow plants in water without soil.

title: Robot Car with Obstacle Detection
summary: Make a robot car that avoids obstacles using ultrasonic sensor.

title: Earthquake Alarm
summary: Detect vibration using a tilt switch or spring sensor.

title: DIY Thermoelectric Generator
summary: Generate power using temperature difference with Peltier module.
engineeringNotes: Use boost converter for more power.

title: DIY Digital Clock
summary: Build a digital clock using RTC module.
conclusion: RTC keeps time even without power.

title: Rainwater Harvesting Model
summary: Build a model house with rainwater collection system.

title: DIY Electric Generator (Hand Crank)
summary: Generate electricity by rotating a motor manually.

title: DIY Periscope
summary: Build a periscope using mirrors to see over obstacles.

title: Smart Street Light System
summary: Automatically turn streetlights on/off using LDR.
expectedOutput: Lights turn on at night automatically.

title: DIY Wind Vane
summary: Build a wind direction indicator using paper and straw.

title: Line Following Robot
summary: Robot follows a black line using IR sensors.

title: DIY Hot Air Balloon Model
summary: Make a hot air balloon using tissue paper and warm air.
conclusion: Hot air is lighter than cold air.

title: Digital Thermometer
summary: Build a digital thermometer using LM35 sensor.

title: Electric Bell Model
summary: Make an electric bell using electromagnets.
conclusion: Electromagnets convert electrical to mechanical motion.

title: Smart Plant Pot (Moisture Alert)
summary: Pot sends alert when soil gets dry.

title: Biogas Plant Model
summary: Create a working model demonstrating biogas production.

title: Fingerprints Detection
summary: Find fingerprints using powder and tape.

title: Marble Roller Coaster
summary: Build a coaster track to study gravity and acceleration.

title: Water Alarm System
summary: Trigger alarm when water touches probes.

title: Electroplating Demo
summary: Coat metal object with copper using electroplating.

title: Rain Cloud in a Jar
summary: Make artificial rain using hot water and ice.
conclusion: Warm vapor cools to form rain.

title: DIY Compass Robot
summary: Robot points north using magnetometer.

title: Solar Desalination Plant
summary: Convert saltwater into fresh water using solar energy.

title: Smart Attendance System (RFID)
summary: RFID-based attendance logging system.

title: Smart Mirror
summary: Magic mirror displays date, weather, news.

title: DIY Drone (Basic Quad)
summary: Build a basic quadcopter using brushless motors.

title: DIY Lie Detector (Pressure-Based)
summary: Test stress by measuring finger pressure changes.

title: Hydraulic Lift Model
summary: Use syringes and water to build a simple hydraulic lift.

title: Air Pollution Detector (MQ135)
summary: Measure air quality using MQ135 sensor.

title: Magnetic Levitation Model
summary: Levitate an object using repelling magnets.

title: Heart Rate Monitor (Pulse Sensor)
summary: Measure pulse rate using an optical sensor.

title: DIY Electroscope
summary: Detect electrical charges using foil leaves.

title: Solar Tracker (Light Following)
summary: Track sunlight using LDR sensors and servo motors.

title: Earthquake Alarm System
summary: Detect vibrations using a spring + buzzer system.

title: DIY Hand Crank Generator
summary: Generate electricity manually using a dynamo motor.

title: Anti-Sleep Alarm (Driver Safety)
summary: Detect head tilt using tilt switch and trigger alarm.

title: DIY Microscope (Lens + Smartphone)
summary: Build a mini microscope using a small lens and smartphone camera.
